CustomField.formula: IF (DATEVALUE(LogoutTime) >= DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(LogoutTime)),03,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(LogoutTime)),03,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) && DATEVALUE(LogoutTime) < DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(LogoutTime)),10,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(LogoutTime)),10,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7), LogoutTime + (2/24), LogoutTime + (1/24))
CustomField.label: Logout GMT
